info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Beauregard and southwestern Vernon Parishes through 615 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Junction, or 8 miles north of Merryville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merryville and Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
